name: Dark Desire 1
description:
Dark Desire

This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.
The game is in FULL HD (1080p) resolution and full of choices. The main focus is to create as many choices and paths as possible and let you guide the characters: depending on the choice you make, each character has love points or a relationship has blocking points. You can always view the status in the detailed BIO screen in the menu, including relationship status and partner.

If all goes well, the plan is to release also DLCs, to use the Love Points and decisions and paths, to make it as dynamic as possible. A very optimistic plan is to have 50 episodes released in 10 episodes batches.

The plan is to create 10 episodes at first and then see how the size affects the performance.
EP01 - Shani and Ann (complete)
- (in development: play as Shani or Ann or story mode) (if you play as Ann, Shani's actions are random, nice, hu!? :))
EP02 - Ann and Shani (complete)
- (in development: play as Shani or Ann or story mode)
EP03 - Cindy and Zac (complete)
- (play as Cindy (female) or Zac (male) and has alternative outfits for different parts)
EP04 - The Path to Vengeance (Cindy 19 years old - continues from Midnight Stories)- release planned in MAR
EP05 - in production - more info soon - release planned in MAR/APR
EP06 - in production - more info soon - release planned in APR/MAY
EP07 - in production - more info soon - release planned in MAY/JUN
EP08 - in production - more info soon - release planned in JUN/JUL
EP09 - in production - more info soon - release planned in JUL/AUG
EP10 - in production - more info soon - release planned in AUG/SEP

The game has renders, but NO sound effects and characters are NOT voiced. NO animation is planned for this release.
